name: Line of Cube
description:
At First of All Thanks to Nikhil Sir for Hosting the Game Jam.

My Name is Shahzad Ansari, a 14 year old Game Developer.

The Name of this Game is Line of Cube, Which  means that a cube will run creating a Line and you to just tap to rotate it and save from falling and obstacles.

 

Yeah! I Know this Is Big-Sized And Only had 2 levels because as you know I have Only 7days and all spend on creating this level and the last day I have to quickly make ui which is very weird and bad Looking. I will just give a New Update after which everything will be fixed.
